tika-s0303t9:1_0: 438-549. Mūlagandhādibhedaṁ gandhaṁ avanti apayuñjantīti gandhabbā, tesaṁ kāyo samūho
tika-s0303t9:1_1: gandhabbakāyo, gandhabbadevanikāyo. Cātumahārājikesu ekiyāva te daṭṭhabbā, tappariyāpannatāya
tika-s0303t9:1_2: tattha vā niyuttāti gandhabbakāyikā. Tesaṁ tesaṁ rukkhagacchalatānaṁ mūlaṁ paṭicca
tika-s0303t9:1_3: pavatto gandho mūlagandho, tasmiṁ mūlagandhe. Adhivatthāti mūlagandhaṁ adhiṭṭhāya,
tika-s0303t9:1_4: abhibhuyya vā vasantā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Taṁ nissāyāti taṁ mūlagandhaṁ rukkhaṁ paccayaṁ
tika-s0303t9:1_5: katvā nibbattā. Na kevalaṁ tattha gandho eva, mūlameva vā tesaṁ paccayoti dassento
tika-s0303t9:1_6: “so hī”tiādimāha. Upakappatīti nivāsaṭṭhānabhāvena viniyuñjati. Gandhagandheti gandhānaṁ
tika-s0303t9:1_7: gandhasamudāye. Mūlādigandhānaṁ gandheti mūlādigataavayavagandhānaṁ gandhe, timūlādigatasamudāyabhūteti
tika-s0303t9:1_8: attho. Pubbe hi “mūlagandhe”tiādinā rukkhānaṁ avayavagandho gahito, idha pana sabbaso
tika-s0303t9:1_9: gahitattā samudāyagandho veditabbo. Tenāha “yassa hi rukkhassā”tiādi. Soti so sabbo
tika-s0303t9:1_10: mūlādigato gandho gandhasamudāyo idha gandhagandho nāma. Tassa gandhassa gandheti
tika-s0303t9:1_11: tassa samudāyagandhassa tathābhūte gandhe. Sarikkhaṁ sadisaṁ paṭidānaṁ etissāti sarikkhadānaṁ,
tika-s0303t9:1_12: patthanā. Yathādhippetaphalāni sarikkhadānattāva adhippetaphalaṁ dentu, asarikkhadānaṁ
tika-s0303t9:1_13: kathanti? Tampi detiyeva puññassa sabbakāmadadattāti āha “asarikkhadānampī”tiādi.
